statements.select: SELECT DISTINCT T2.WH_Name FROM PIS_Inventory T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Warehouse T2 ON T2.WH_ID = T1.INV_WH_ID AND T2.WH_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.INV_WH_ID IS NOT NULL AND T1.INV_WH_ID != '' AND #WHERE_WH_ID# LIKE '%;' + T1.INV_WH_ID + ';%' AND T1.INV_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT DISTINCT T2.WH_Name FROM PIS_StockInDetail T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Warehouse T2 ON T2.WH_ID = T1.SID_WH_ID AND T2.WH_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.SID_WH_ID IS NOT NULL AND T1.SID_WH_ID != '' AND #WHERE_WH_ID# LIKE '%;' + T1.SID_WH_ID + ';%' AND T1.SID_IsValid = 1

DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.WH_ID) FROM PIS_Warehouse T1 LEFT JOIN SM_Organization T2 ON T2.Org_ID = T1.WH_Org_ID AND T2.Org_IsValid = 1 WHERE 1 = 1
T1.WH_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WH_No#+'%'
T1.WH_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WH_Name#+'%'
T1.WH_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WH_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.WH_Address LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WH_Address#+'%'
T1.WH_IsValid=#WHERE_WH_IsValid#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , T1.WH_ID , T1.WH_No , T1.WH_Name , T1.WH_Org_ID , T2.Org_ShortName 'OrgName' , T1.WH_Address , T1.WH_Description , T1.WH_IsValid , T1.WH_CreatedBy , T1.WH_CreatedTime , T1.WH_UpdatedBy , T1.WH_UpdatedTime , T1.WH_VersionNo FROM PIS_Warehouse T1 LEFT JOIN SM_Organization T2 ON T2.Org_ID = T1.WH_Org_ID AND T2.Org_IsValid = 1 WHERE 1 = 1
T1.WH_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WH_No#+'%'
T1.WH_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WH_Name#+'%'
T1.WH_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WH_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.WH_Address LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WH_Address#+'%'
T1.WH_IsValid=#WHERE_WH_IsValid#
ORDER BY T1.WH_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY
